definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: blow, stripe, lit. of scourging, chastising De 25:3, Pr 20:30 (‖[[חַבֻּרוֹת פֶּחַע]]); [[מַכַּת חֶרֶב]] Es 9:5 (as acc. cogn.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: beating, scourging, fig. of defeat of Midian Is 10:26 (‖[[עוֹרֵר שׁוֹט]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: oft. wound 1Ki 22:35, 2Ki 8:29, 2Ki 9:15 = 2Ch 22:6 (rd. ´[[מִן־הַמּ]]), Zec 13:6 ([[בֵּין יָדֶיְ]]); symbol. of violence Je 6:7 (+ [[חֳלִי]]); [[פֶּחַע וְחַבּוּרָה וּמַכָּה טְרִיׇּה]] Is 1:6 (of Judah, under fig. of maltreated man), cf. Mic 1:9 [[אֲנוּשָׁה]]´[[מ]]), Na 3:19 (‖[[שֶׁבֶר]]; of Nineveh), esp. in Je (of Judah): Je 10:19, Je 14:17, Je 30:12 (all + [[נַחֲלָה]] severe; ‖[[שֶׁבֶר]]), Je 15:18 ([[אֲנוּשָׁה]] ´[[מ]]), Je 19:8, Je 47:17, Je 50:13, as acc. cogn. Je 30:14, c. vb. [[רָפָא]] heal v:Je 30:17; also ´[[מַחַץ מ]] Is 30:26 (‖[[שֶׁבֶר]]); of wounds made by ´[[י]]'s arrows Ps 64:8.
= defeat, as acc. cogn. c. [[הִכָּה]] Jos 10:10, Jos 11:33, Jos 15:8, 2Ch 28:5; = conquest (of ´[[י]]) Is 14:6.
